question: The 7,500th Janaushadhi Kendra has been inaugurated recently in which state?
explanation:
The Prime Minster Shri. Narendra Modi has recently inaugurated the nation’s 7,500th Janaushadhi Kendra of the country at Shillong – Meghalaya.
These Janaushadhi Kendras have been opened under Pradhan Mantri Bhartiya Janaushadhi Pariyojana, which is a central government scheme that aims to provide quality medicines at affordable cost.
